en.title: [Aug 2025] Statistical Bulletin
en.description: Review of key publications during the month, covering demographic, economic, social, and environmental statistics.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest Monthly Statistical Bulletin, covering demographic, economic, social, and environmental statistics.

bm.title: [Ogo 2025] Buletin Statistik
bm.description: Sorotan penerbitan penting semasa bulan tersebut, merangkumi statistik demografi, ekonomi, sosial, dan alam sekitar.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan Buletin Statistik Bulanan terkini, merangkumi statistik demografi, ekonomi, sosial, dan alam sekitar.
